text: @GregAbbott_TX The 7-day moving avg of new daily cases of coronavirus in Tx jumped over 500 from yesterday to 3,074 for the 7-day period ending 6/19! We had almost 4,500 new cases in Tx just today! You are a failure. Get your head out of Trump’s ass, @GregAbbott_TX ! #GregAbbott #TexasCOVID
